name: Madenkönig
description:
Madenkönig is a simple game about nutrturing your children and making more room to help them grow. Sometimes that means to kill some of them to get to the other side of the room. Enjoy!

Your goal is to make more space for your larvas. If there are too many larvas you will loose. Raise your larva-limit by extending the room. Try to gain as children much as possible.

- Change your Equipment on E and Q

- Move on WASD

- Take action on Space

Good luck!
